name: ecs-pf
description: CLI for port-forwarding to RDS via AWS ECS

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external @aws-sdk/client-ec2 --external @aws-sdk/client-ecs --external @aws-sdk/client-rds --external @aws-sdk/client-ssm --external @inquirer/prompts --external chalk --external commander --external fuse.js --external inquirer --external inquirer-search-list --external remeda && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > temp_file && sed '1{/^#!/d;}' dist/cli.js >> temp_file && mv temp_file dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js
